sections.PROJECT:
Manager on IMNET Electronic Medical Records software.
Learned MSSQL to support system and help implement for Medical Records and charting needs, electronic sign-off by physician.
sections.ABOUT:
PMO engagement in health care, as I have watched
over 17 years of what was once lacking in this industry, take hold and prove its value and worth. I have had the pleasure and benefit of watching
three organizations grow and blossom their teams with training and growth and development of a methodology that fits the culture of each
organization.
